attributes.action: accept petitions which are fairly and correctly worded in proper language even if they do not coincide with the views of your team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You are rejecting my petition becaue it does not echo the Labour Party policy, but has neverthless ben accepted by a part of the electorate. Discrimination like this is an offence under the HRA.

rejection.details: The petitions website is run by civil servants. We can not accept petitions that are political in any way. Also, comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
